sentences.english: A skinny fox sits on the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 一隻瘦骨嶙峋的狐狸趴在高處的小丘頂上。

sentences.english: On every hand was a charming view of rocky buttresses and wooded heights.
sentences.chinese: 到處是山石嶙峋，密林峯巔，景色迷人。

sentences.english: A clear mountain stream flows steadily through a rocky defile.
sentences.chinese: 一股清澈的山澗平穩的流過嶙峋的峽谷。

sentences.english: The jagged cliffs of Cassis drop down to the Mediterranean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 怪石嶙峋的卡西斯懸崖從地中海中拔地而起。

sentences.english: Both were over six feet, and as thin as rails.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人都身高六尺多，瘦骨嶙峋。

sentences.english: These big-eyed scrawny boys put out a small newspaper .
sentences.chinese: 這些大眼睛的瘦骨嶙峋的孩子辦了一份小報。

sentences.english: The knotty joints of his hips and shoulders stood out a good three inches from his body.
sentences.chinese: 腰胯和雙肩的關節瘦骨嶙峋，突出身體三英寸之多。

sentences.english: The ancients thought its jagged peaks resembled gods and heavenly guardians .
sentences.chinese: 古人認爲它嶙峋的尖峯就像神仙和天兵。

sentences.english: She was not merely thin but skeletal.
sentences.chinese: 她如今不再是清瘦而是瘦骨嶙峋。

sentences.english: He was a man of forty, thin, with a pinched face, precise and rather pedantic .
sentences.chinese: 他年已四十，瘦骨嶙峋，一張乾瘦的臉，刻板而迂腐。

definition: (of cliffs etc) stand like a wall/rise steeply
